platform_overview: Rentala is a modern, secure, and intuitive property management platform designed to bridge the gap between property managers and tenants.

getting_started.login: Navigate to the login page and enter your registered email and password. The platform uses JWT authentication and locks accounts after 5 failed attempts for security.

roles.property_manager: Full access to portfolio management, financial reporting, and tenant oversight.
roles.tenant: Access to the personal Tenant Portal for lease management, payments, and maintenance requests.

manager_guide.dashboard: Provides a real-time snapshot of portfolio health, including metrics like Total Portfolio Value, Occupancy Rate, Monthly Revenue, and Vacancy Rate.
manager_guide.managing_properties: Click 'Properties' in the sidebar to view your portfolio. Use 'Add Property' to create new listings by filling in name, address, units, and rent.
manager_guide.tenant_management: View active tenants in the Tenant Directory and monitor lease start/end dates with expiration alerts.
manager_guide.financial_reports: Generate summaries in the 'Reports' section and use the 'Export' button to download data in CSV format.

tenant_guide.dashboard: Personalized portal showing lease summary (unit, term, rent) and payment status.
tenant_guide.payments: View payment history and use the 'Pay Rent' button to initiate secure payments.
tenant_guide.maintenance: Submit new requests by describing the issue and setting priority. Track status (Pending, In Progress, Completed) in real-time.

security.data_protection: Uses AES-256 encryption. Data is isolated so users only see relevant information.
security.compliance: Compliant with GDPR and POPIA regulations.

support.forgot_password: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page for a secure reset.
